roleset_name: drop smth heavily/carelessly, perhaps making a plopping noise

roles.descr: agent, person purposefully doing the dropping
roles.descr_trans: 特工，故意丢弃物品的人

roles.descr: location/destination of the thing being dropped
roles.descr_trans: 被丢弃物品的位置/目的地

roleset_name_trans: 重重地/不小心地掉落某物，也许会发出扑通扑通的声音
